title: Understanding PTSD
text: PTSD stands for Post-Traumatic Stress Disorder. It is a mental health condition that can develop after experiencing or witnessing a terrifying event.

title: Symptoms of PTSD
text: Common symptoms of PTSD include intrusive thoughts or memories of the trauma, avoidance of trauma reminders, negative changes in mood or thinking, and hyperarousal or reactivity.

hintAnswer: a mental health condition that can develop after experiencing or witnessing a terrifying event
title: Defining PTSD
choices: a mental health condition that can develop after experiencing or witnessing a terrifying event
